alert.note: Alert for Southampton; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 7:22PM EDT until July 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Southampton County in southeastern Virginia... South central Sussex County in southeastern Virginia... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 722 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Boykins, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Newsoms around 730 PM EDT. Courtland around 755 PM EDT. Sedley around 800 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Vicksville, Sebrell, Joyner, Shiloh, Story, Little Texas, Worrell and Capron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
